transactionItems.description: A list of the items that make up the overall transaction. The items may include subitems.

transactionItemId.description: An identifier for this part of the overall transaction.

taxPeriodFrom.description: The 'from' date of this tax period. Date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD

taxPeriodTo.description: The 'to' date of this tax period. Date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD

originalAmount.description: The original value of this transaction.

outstandingAmount.description: The remaining amount due on this transaction.

dueDate.description: The date by when the amount is due to be paid. Date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD

paymentMethod.description: The method used to make the payment.

paymentId.description: The unique identifier for the payment.

subItems.description: The list of updates to this part of the charge or payment.

subItemId.description: The unique identifier for this entry.

amount.description: The amount that this entry changed the transaction by.

clearingDate.description: The date this entry changed the item. Date in the format: YYYY-MM-DD

outgoingPaymentMethod.description: The method used to make the outgoing payment.

paymentAmount.description: The amount that this entry changed the transaction by.

paymentMethod.description: The method used to make the payment.

paymentId.description: The unique identifier for the payment.

items.description: A list of endpoint links that indicate possible actions related to the current resource

href.description: The relative url of the endpoint

rel.description: A label for the endpoint, which describes how it is related to the current resource. The rel will be self where the action is retrieval of the same resource

method.description: The HTTP method type for the endpoint
